Package org.sugarcubes.cloner

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sugarcubes.cloner.ReflectionUtils
  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Shortcuts for Java Reflection API.
